website_summaries.verdict: This plant-based calcium supplement includes K2, which helps channel calcium into bones.
pros: Calcium helps fight osteoporosis, strengthens bones, helps joints stay supple, and can help fight heart disease
These slow-release tablets have resulted in better bone density results for several users
No gluten, dairy, eggs, nuts, or animal byproducts
cons: Dosage is six tablets, which can be costly or cumbersome
Contains maltodextrin, which can negatively affect some users

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Highly reccomended by nutritionist. My sisters bone density test returned to normal after taking these for a year...
customer_reviews.author: Mona Dorminey

customer_reviews.title: Endrocrinologist recommended
customer_reviews.text: My Endocrinologist recommended this as the best calcium supplement. Frequent blood testing at his office revealed that the product worked well for its intended purpose of raising my calcium levels I am not compensated for this review
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Took one pill because I was concerned about the wheat and soy even though it says they are gluten free and inert. First day got sore on upper palate. Took one the second day and my entire roof of the mouth was burning and my whole gi tract was inflamed and we so fatigued i spent 20 hours in bed. Glad I only took one.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Dixit

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have menopause and all my bones and joints hurt to the point where it’s hard to walk. I took this yesterday and immediately felt the difference the next day. I will give u more details when a month passes by
customer_reviews.author: wandy

customer_reviews.title: Price increases
customer_reviews.text: I don't dislike the product, but I do dislike the unreasonable price hikes. I have a subscription that started out under $34.00, this year. My last shipment was over $40.00. I'll have to check the price on the next shipment. I plan on cancelling this product if it exceeds $34.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopperz

customer_reviews.title: Counting on these to work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have researched ingredients for bone building and these fit the bill. My regular Dr. called me after my last scan to tell me my bones were thinning and I need to take 1500 mg of calcium per day.! Well, my cardiologist had told me not to take calcium bc it can clog one's arteries! And the prescription drugs that were given for osteoporosis are now having serious side effects! WOW!!! So, I am giving these a try and hope they work... I have had no problems with them and I have been taking them for a month. They are a tablet so I hope they are dissolving and absorbing!
customer_reviews.author: burkehart

customer_reviews.title: After I took it, I felt nauseous and tired ...
customer_reviews.text: After I took it, I felt nauseous and tired. I had to stop taking this immediately after two days. Be cautious!
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: New Chapter Bone Strength
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a review person but New Chapter Bone Strength deserves the accolades. This product was recommended to me by my Naturopathic Doctor..I can't thank her enough. I've been taking it for a year. My recent Dexa Scan showed a reversal from Osteoporosis to Osteopenia. I was blown away because my regular MD led me to believe that reversal was not in the big picture...she laughed when she said it. Guess I have the last laugh!!!! I highly recommend this product and will take it faithfully. Looking to reverse the Osteopenia for the next Scan. Off to consult my Naturopathic Doctor...to thank her!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: This product is very expensive and does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have taken the New Chapter Bone Strength for at least 6 months and my nails are still very brittle. It this was a good calcium, it would improve my nails. It is also very expensive. I'm not purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CHOICE IS BONE STRENGTH!
customer_reviews.text: These Bone Strength tablets will give you ease in your bones within 2 days after starting to take them. They are excellent. I was in pain every day until I discovered Bone Strength. This supplement is exactly what you need if you have any bone pain. I take them every day for over a year and stand firmly by the fact that they will improve your life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For me it's been very good.
customer_reviews.text: Start slowly. Very absorbable, I added 1 every 2 - 3 months til I was up to 4. I'm not a 110lb adult - double that with vigorous activities. In the beginning I had an sinus allergy to it. I've been using it for 8 years now. No issues since the first couple months. It's just the first 3 - 6 months. For me it's been very good.
customer_reviews.author: cm03079

customer_reviews.title: The supplement is great- but what's up with the packaging?
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this supplement for years and it has given me strong bones, even at my age of 68. However, and this is a big one, it was packaged in a gigantic waste of colored cardboard- a "presentation", I presume. It makes me wonder about the efficacy of the actual product. Stop wasting the planet's resources, and keep your eye on the quality of your product, please!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great source of calcium healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these regularly now for almost a year. My bone scan last year determined I'm am very border line osteo and this product has such raving reviews I hope and belive its helping keep my bone from becoming to soft and brittle. Defiantly don't need to shrink anymore than I already have. ( I was 5'3" once upon a time now at almost 40 im barely 5'1").
customer_reviews.author: Loretta B

customer_reviews.title: Count your pills if you order these - we got several defective ones
customer_reviews.text: 9 of the 60 pills in the bottle were tiny chunks or pieces instead of whole pills. I'm glad I bothered to count. Amazon is very good about replacing defective items but you should count what's in your bottle to make sure you get what you paid for. Otherwise I like this brand very much because they are a good combination of high quality plant based ingredients with almost no fillers or additives and are quite slim and easy to swallow This particular brand was recommended by our gastroenterologist.
customer_reviews.author: Kilidonia de Acero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product..
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and have used if FOR YEARS. I recently purchased 2 bottles for my 2 kids. One of the bottles was broken so that little shards of glass were inside so we tossed it. We couldn't figure out how that could happen as the bottle was packaged really well. I find this product to be reliable and trustworthy. I have recommended to many people as well.
customer_reviews.author: coconut girl

customer_reviews.title: Better then AlgaeCal Plus
customer_reviews.text: I was paying for algaeCal plus and strontium but it was really expensive. This product is easier to swallow and already has the strontium included in each pill. No need to take so many pills. The pills are also flat making them easy to take and are tasteless.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality of calcium
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of New Chapter, but I wish they could have lower price without compromising the quality. Anyway, I think the Bone Strength is a good product for me since I have been taking them for years. However, I usually have to wait until the promotion in order to save a bit of money, especially at time like this.
customer_reviews.author: wayn

customer_reviews.title: New Chapter Calcium & Magnedium Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem taking New Chapter Calcuim& magnesium supplement. Easy to swallow, no stomach issues & I think I’m getting a better night sleep. Bought on Amazon buy 1 get 50 % of 2nd one
customer_reviews.author: dors8696

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard to measure the benefits of such a calcium supplement. I suffer from severe osteoporosis and I ordered this very expensive coral calcium brand following the recommendations of a nutritionist who said that because it is combined with other minerals, this quality of coral calcium is one of the best on the market. A lot better than any regular mineral calcium which tends to deposit in your arteries. The big "plus" is that those tablets are slim so a lot easier than most of other calcium supplement tablets or capsules.
customer_reviews.author: TAINE

customer_reviews.title: Best Calcium Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have always been concerned about calcium supplements made from elemental calcium. They are very controversial for women. I love this one because it is a whole food supplement made from plants. I gave it 4 stars because it is in a glass container/bottle and is delivered in what looks like a very expensive gift box. I would prefer a non-breakable container and NO expensive looking box. Great supplement, though!!
customer_reviews.author: jczecher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow, seem effective
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin and easy to swallow. I started taking them to combat pregnancy leg cramps, and in the two weeks or so I’ve been taking them I only got one minor cramp. My tooth sensitivity also has improved.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars because I HOPE it is that good. How can I possibly know shy of bone density test comparisons or something? The packaging...size and ease of taking these pills...the apparent natural sourcing etc seems top rated... I am trying to ward off the deliterious effects of ADT hormone therapy on bones. I hope it is as good as they promote themselves to be.
customer_reviews.author: Brewman

customer_reviews.title: I Heard This Is The best
customer_reviews.text: I have only been taking these for a month now. A friend of mine was having a problem with having hard stools. Her doctor recommended this brand because it is plant based instead of stone.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Green

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and this product gets her bloated. She hasn't noticed any improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Ozuna

customer_reviews.title: like seniors, who need to reverse the process of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works to build bone mass in those, like seniors, who need to reverse the process of losing bone mass too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.title: Improves done density
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this product my done density has improved each year. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: More fun

customer_reviews.title: Leg pain and cramping increased
customer_reviews.text: This product caused severe leg pain and muscle cramps in my calves. Found this out by not taking it for 5 days and the pain left. Started the dose again and leg pain and cramping started within 1 hr of taking the pills. There must be some filler or additive that caused this problem so will not be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharina H.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: The calcium supplement really helps with bone strength. My pain is gone where the bones have become osteoporotic. The bills are smaller than other brands I've tried and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One pill contains it all
customer_reviews.text: One Pill gives you calcium and D3. So much better than taking two big pills at a time. A little pricey but worth it. Dr. Says bone scan looked good. Keep doing whatever your doing.
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Best one on the market
customer_reviews.text: As a Senior needing additional calcium, Bone Strength helps keep my bones strong. Even my doctor asked me what supplement I was using. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Travelin' J

customer_reviews.title: The product is great.  I love it. Delivery was horrid.
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors found my package in the middle of the road. My house is well off the road, so I would never have seen it, and I was not home. They put it on Facebook and my daughter saw it. I want to know who was responsible for getting it delivered. I am lucky the school bus or the logging trucks didn't run over it. It better get delivered to the porch next time.
customer_reviews.author: colleen moore

customer_reviews.title: Product contains and ingredient that is a heavy metal
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for some time and was told by an endocrinologist that it contains strontium, which is a heavy metal, and to discontinue use. This is very disturbing to be since it is a non-gmo product. I thought this was a safe company.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine P.

customer_reviews.title: Broken tablets
customer_reviews.text: As stated in a previous review, about 1/3 of the tablets received in my last order were broken. I have taken these tablets for several years and have never seen this before. It makes one wonder if the shoddy condition of the tablets is indicative of sloppy production standards as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Irby

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass container- piils mixed with glass powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the container broken. It is made out of glass, and even if the paper pack was intact, inside of package the jar was broken, the top was cut ,slit. I gave only 2 stars because of the poor container, not for the product which is great. I had to discharge the pills being mixed with glass powder, and it cost me $44.98.

I try to take three right before I fall asleep at night and can always tell the difference the next day. I'll take them until I die... Which is hopefully a long time away thanks to these.

customer_reviews.text: I like the good quality and the ingredients. My bones are stronger and healthier:
customer_reviews.author: Philly

product_meta.title: New Chapter Calcium Supplement – Bone Strength Whole Food Calcium with Vitamin K2 + D3 + Magnesium, Vegetarian, Gluten Free 180 count (2 month supply)
product_meta.description: Size:180 Count (Pack of 1)| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingDo you know what is in your calcium supplement? Truth is, most common types of calcium supplements are calcium carbonate derived from limestone rock. They lack Vitamin K2 which is essential to direct calcium to the bones, where you need it most, not where you don't. Bone Strength Take Care is different. It’s the #1-selling natural plant based calcium. New Chapter Calcium includes Vitamin K2 and fermented Vitamin D3 for a 3-in-1 complete formula that is essential for bone health, heart health and joint mobility.
feature_bullets: Plant-Sourced, Whole-Food Calcium; Reduces the risk of osteoporosis+

Clinical Strength plant calcium with Vitamin K2 to direct calcium to bones, where you need it most, not where you don't. Fermented with Vitamin D3 for absorption, Magnesium and 70+ whole-food trace minerals
3-in-1 Benefit: Bone strength support, joint flexibility & heart health support
Easy-to-Swallow slim tablets with slow & steady release.
Non-GMO Project Verified, 100% Vegetarian, Kosher, Certified Gluten Free by NSF, Sustainably Harvested.
Look for “Ships from and sold by Amazon.com” when adding to cart to ensure you are buying genuine New Chapter products with current dating.
